EnhancedContent:
Setting up the Dell XPS850 that I have tried for some four years to have my wife first get rid of the huge accumulation of useless email and other objects, which she finally did recently, I needed the Windows Address Bar to help me find the hidden C{\ Program Data folder sp that I could see what was there related to a downloaded SDK program that I have had a grand total of no such action despite the many `help' files I read.

Given that I only rarely use the Windows File Manager, I was amazed at my total failure to locate the bar. I did eventually find a rather simple way of opening the file which to no surprise was of no help. Having found the file, I then found that when I closed it it was not in the list of files on the C:\ drive.

Once someone or more here gets the program data folder to be dded to the file list for me, then I shall ask how to remove an unwarranted pair of SDKs, the instructions for which are in a language which may not have even been created as yet.
Author: IsaiahJames
Title: Wherefore Art Thou, Address Bar? (Found It)
Description:
Setting up the Dell XPS850 that I have tried for some four years to have my wife first get rid of the huge accumulation of useless email and other objects, which she finally did recently, I needed the Windows Address Bar to help me find the hidden C{\ Program Data folder sp that I could see what was there related to a downloaded SDK program that I have had a grand total of no such action despite the many `help' files I read.

Given that I only rarely use the Windows File Manager, I was amazed at my total failure to locate the bar. I did eventually find a rather simple way of opening the file which to no surprise was of no help. Having found the file, I then found that when I closed it it was not in the list of files on the C:\ drive.

Once someone or more here gets the program data folder to be dded to the file list for me, then I shall ask how to remove an unwarranted pair of SDKs, the instructions for which are in a language which may not have even been created as yet.
